title: [Bug]:
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

App crashes on opening after install

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.11

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. click on icon to install from Fedora Desktop "Software" App
2. Click on open to launch app.
3.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.App would open
2. App crashes immediately "problem Reporter" app says

Likely crash reason: Illegal instruction (jump to a random address?)
Exploitable rating (0-9 scale): 5
```

### Debug
